body_html:
@Dtiffster Have you noticed the warning "Modules with different CPU types were found"? It seems that some of your dynamic runtime libraries(like API-MS-WIN-CORE-CONSOLE-L1-1-0.dll) are for x86, not for x64. Are you using 64 bits Python? If yes, please remove and reinstall the package of MSVC2015 using the following commands.

conda install vs2015_runtime

If it is still not resolved, please check.your environment variable PATH, and remove the additional reference to these dlls that is before those lies in Anaconda dir.
body:
@Dtiffster Have you noticed the warning "Modules with different CPU types were found"? It seems that some of your dynamic runtime libraries(like API-MS-WIN-CORE-CONSOLE-L1-1-0.dll) are for x86, not for x64. Are you using 64 bits Python? If yes, please remove and reinstall the package of MSVC2015 using the following commands.
```powershell
conda install vs2015_runtime
```
If it is still not resolved, please check.your environment variable `PATH`, and remove the additional reference to these dlls that is before those lies in Anaconda dir.
